unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Conditions for Two-Way Tables
question_text: Which of the following statements is/are true concerning conditions for chi-squared procedures involving two-way tables? I. Data must come from a random sample or random samples. II. Expected counts must all be greater than $1$ , and no more than $20\%$ of expected counts can be less than $5$ . III. $np$ and $n(1-p)$ must both be greater than $5$ where $n$ is the number of trials and $p$ is the proportion of successes.
